text: is a Japanese singer, actor and dancer. Imai works for the Japanese agency Johnny & Associates. He joined Johnny & Associates in 1995. He officially debuted in 2002 in the duo Tackey & Tsubasa with Hideaki Takizawa. They are signed under the record label Avex Trax. Imai released his solo debut single "Backborn" on 24 February 2010. ==Filmography== * Mokuyou no kaidan (1995) * Brothers (ブラザーズ) (1998) * Summer Snow (2000) * Never Land (2001) * Saigo no Bengonin (The Last Lawyer) (2003) * Yoshitsune (2005) * Haru to Natsu (2005) ==References== ==Other websites== * Tackey & Tsubasa official webite Category:Singers from Kanagawa Prefecture Category:Japanese movie actors Category:Japanese voice actors Category:1981 births Category:Living people
title: Tsubasa Imai
